Forbes: Berkeley College buildings File:Branford_Court_spring_2.JPG|Branford College courtyard File:Dport.jpg|Davenport College courtyard File:MainCourtyardTrumbull.jpg|Trumbull College courtyard File:Pierson_college.jpg|Pierson College courtyard File:Timothy_dwight_ginkgo.jpg|Timothy Dwight College's ginkgo tree    ====Calhoun College====  In the wake of the racially-motivated church shooting in Charleston, South Carolina, Yale was under criticism again in the summer of 2015 for Calhoun College, one of 12 residential colleges, which was named after John C. Calhoun, a slave-owner and strong slavery supporter in the nineteenth century. In July 2015 students signed a petition calling for the name change.
